chapter.title: Adapter Overview
chapter.para: Input and output adapters to Esper provide the means of accepting events from various sources, and for making available events to destinations.
The following input adapters are available. There are currently no output adapters available.

entry.para: The CSV input adapter can read one or more CSV files, transform the textual values into events, and play the events into the engine. The CSV adapter also makes it possible to run complete simulations of events arriving in time-order from different input streams.

sect2.title: Using AdapterInputSource
